Here's how you know

Official websites use .gov
A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.

Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
A lock ( ) or https:// means you've safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

    Empowering Frontline VHA Employees

    Our Mission

    VHA Innovators Network (iNET) is a bustling community of employees united by a desire to solve healthcare problems and engage in shared learning. Our specialists facilitate local programming, lead local and national events, and connect employees with the resources they need to design, develop, and test their own solutions.

    And now, iNET has created an Innovation Program Playbook to help external healthcare systems, federal agencies, and others develop their own employee-centric innovation programs.

    Spark Seed Spread

    Investing in VHA Employees as they design new innovative solutions.

    Learn More

    Greenhouse Initiative

    Offering external innovators an opportunity to collaborate.

    Learn More

    Employee Innovator Fundamentals

    Teaching innovation fundamentals and concepts.

    Learn More

    VHA Innovators Network

    Our National Centers

    VAIPM

    VA Intrapreneurial Product Marketplace

    The VA Intrapreneurial Product Marketplace (VAIPM) is a new platform to put employee-developed, purchase-ready innovative products straight into the hands of Veterans. The marketplace is the next step in connecting these new innovations directly with the people they were designed with and for.

    View VA News Article

    Innovators Network Report 2024

    In this year's Annual Report, you will learn about the VA Intrapreneurial Product Marketplace, our efforts to engage Veteran Service Organizations, updated innovation fundamentals content, and more.

    View 2024 Annual Report

    Innovator Spotlight

    Using Innovation to Better Serve Veterans and Their Families

    iNET recognized the accomplishments of three individuals who have excelled in work that is foundational to iNET. The organization's leadership gave the awards during the annual VA Innovation Experience event in October. Join us in celebrating the following individuals for their inspiring work and dedication.

    Read More

    Igniting Employee Innovation

    iNET Releases the Innovation Program Playbook

    Have you been told "no" one too many times? Perhaps you have hit a few roadblocks or noticed outdated practices in your workplace, leading you to frequently and exasperatedly exclaim "why?!". You are also a brave leader desperate to change the culture of your organization. The Playbook provides structure for your future innovation program. The catalyst for the change? Innovation. Embracing front-line power and passion to make a grassroots change.

    In Crisis? Get Help Now

    We’re here anytime, day or night - 24/7

    If you are a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, connect with our caring, qualified responders for confidential help. Many of them are Veterans themselves.

    • Call 1-800-273-8255 and press 1
    • Text to 838255
    • Chat confidentially now
    • Call TTY if you have hearing loss 1-800-799-4889

    Get more resources at VeteransCrisisLine.net.
